channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Two and a Half Men
channel.desc: Depressed after his breakup from Courtney (Jenny McCarthy), Charlie goes to see his psychiatrist (Jane Lynch).

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Last Man Standing
channel.desc: Mike is offered the chance to submit an artifact to a renowned museum; Mike and his buddies decide to do their colonoscopy prep together; the women plan a nostalgic slumber party.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Last Man Standing
channel.desc: Mike and Vanessa ask newlyweds Mandy and Kyle to tone down their open displays of affection; Kristen gets Eve a chance to play at the Grill, but Ed wants to fire her after a less than thrilling performance.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: In Depth With Graham Bensinger
channel.desc: Before the age of 30, journalist and Emmy-winner Graham Bensinger worked not only for major networks like NBC and ESPN, but he also began his own syndicated interview program that airs weekly across the country. Bensinger chats with some of sports' biggest names, including pro football players Terrell Owens and Tony Romo, professional basketball player Kobe Bryant, boxing champion George Foreman and broadcaster Joe Buck. The half-hour show features sports stars discussing their lives and careers, including some controversial topics they would probably like to forget.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: The Verdict With Judge Hatchett
channel.desc: A woman blames her neighbor's son for her daughter's injury; a man sues a tenant for back rent and late fees.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Justice for All With Judge Cristina P?rez
channel.desc: A woman sues a chef after viral specialty sauce sends her to the hospital; a dispute between roommates over a damaged figurine set.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Forensic Files
channel.desc: San Diego police investigate the murder of a missing person whose hands turn up in a dumpster; an anonymous letter, containing details only the killer would know, offers clues to solving the case.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Lauren Lake's Paternity Court
channel.desc: Identical twins do not know which of them is a 3-year-old boy's father.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Lauren Lake's Paternity Court

channel.name: CW Boston US

channel.desc: De'nara says she's certain that her fianc? is a no-good cheater, and she refuses to marry a man who is unfaithful; Lacey suspects that her new marriage is a sham and that her husband is playing her; Cassandra wants to know if her kids' dad cheated.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Karamo
channel.desc: Zach found out about Juliet's intimate career, and he now questions if they should even be together; unwed parents Naomi and Jae's abusive relationship gets a last-ditch effort as Karamo unlocks both of their phones.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
channel.desc: Debbie says doctors told her someone caused bodily harm to her baby, and she thinks her cousin either assaulted the child or is covering up for the real abuser; Steve gives an update on a guest who confessed to abusing her son, but says it was a lie.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Dr. Phil
channel.desc: Three potential adoptive moms say they were scammed by Melissa, a woman who told each that she was pregnant with a child meant for her. She agreed to meet one face to face, but can Dr. Phil convince her to give the same satisfaction to the other two?

channel.desc: Catch up on everything NFL with the latest news, highlights, and player and celebrity interviews with informative and fun discussions on trending topics from across the football world and beyond.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: True Crime News
channel.desc: A hero cop known for arresting thousands for DUI faces a dilemma when he's forced to arrest one of his own; the unsolved case of surgical technician Ashley Brown, who was beaten and strangled after walking out of an apartment.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Crime Expos? With Nancy O'Dell
channel.desc: A woman is discovered murdered and sexually assaulted at the veterinary clinic where she worked; investigators are able to get a full DNA profile of the killer from the victim's body.

channel.desc: A dispute between exes over a job-hunting wardrobe bought while they were still together; a children's party performer says he was unjustly fired.

channel.name: CW Boston US
